Do you know how to kill your enemies with a single blow?

I do. A Cataclysm Machine! I can make one for you.

All you need to do is throw the switch, and it will trigger an earthquake that will kill all the enemies in a single room.

Once you use it, though, it needs time to recharge. Be careful to use it at the right time.
